House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07830
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING THE YEARLY ALLOCATION FOR SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNOLOGICAL ACTIVITIES (STA) AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to allocate 1% of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) as annual budget for science and technology activities (STA) for generation, advancement, dissemination, and application of scientific knowledge in all fields of Science and Technology; Creates a special fund for research and development to be known as “R&D” from the following sources: a. allocation of 1 percent (1%) of GDP for S&T activities; b. all unused R&D allocation; and c. all income derived from R&D activities
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-31
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY ON 2018-07-30
